content.body: Btw have we asked Patrick  Luthi for feedback on whether these drafts are good enough quality for inclusion in ISO and/or the ECMAScript suite standard?

littledan: I'm not _entirely_ clear on the question. Is it about formatting, language/content, or something else? The formatting is to the Ecma standard (which itself is within the ISO guidelines) Also was this planned to go to JTC1 right away?
content.formatted_body: littledan: I'm not entirely clear on the question. Is it about formatting, language/content, or something else? The formatting is to the Ecma standard (which itself is within the ISO guidelines) Also was this planned to go to JTC1 right away?
